name: CQ.state.PreferencesProvider
doc:
The PreferencesProvider provides user preferences as state.
Internally, it uses a SlingStore for ...

configs.name: data
configs.doc: Name/value pairs for the preferences contained in this provider. This option will only be used if...

configs.name: url
configs.doc: The URL to load data from through an HttpProxy. If set, it will override the data config option.

methods.name: clear
methods.doc: Clears a value from the state

methods.name: decodeValue
methods.doc: Decodes a string previously encoded with encodeValue.

methods.name: encodeValue
methods.doc: Encodes a value including type information.  Decode with decodeValue.

methods.name: get
methods.doc: Returns the current value for a key

methods.name: set
methods.doc: Sets the value for a key

events.name: statechange
events.doc: Fires when a state change occurs.
